What it is: Measures how much of your true self shows up in relationships.
How to use it: Describe several relationships. Ask AI to analyze which ones allow full authenticity and where masking occurs.

What it is: Decodes the story you’re telling through what you avoid saying.
How to use it: Write a letter or description omitting the most uncomfortable truth. Ask AI to identify the missing narrative.
What it changes: Makes unconscious storylines explicit for rewriting.

What it is: Analyzes how your emotions are being distributed daily.
How to use it: Describe your day and energy. Ask AI how much bandwidth went to anxiety, joy, avoidance, or performance.

What it is: Uncovers truths you suspect but won’t admit.
How to use it: Name a persistent doubt or tension. Ask AI to speak the truth you might be avoiding.
What it changes: Confronts denial and accelerates internal clarity.

What it is: Decodes what your living space says about your internal state.
How to use it: Describe your environment. Ask AI to symbolically interpret what each area reflects emotionally.
What it changes: Turns physical space into an emotional feedback tool.

What it is: Predicts where and when emotional spikes will occur.
How to use it: Describe your week. Ask AI which events or interactions are likely to trigger emotional amplification.
What it changes: Enables pre-processing of emotion and better grounding.

What it is: Detects when your tone or language is hiding emotion or identity.
How to use it: Provide a script or message. Ask AI to identify tone mismatches or false social compliance.

What it is: Holds two conflicting truths and finds their synthesis.
How to use it: Describe an internal paradox. Ask AI to articulate both sides fully, then find their shared root.

What it is: Gradually increases your ability to face hard truths.
How to use it: List current fears. Ask AI to rank them in intensity and suggest a stepwise confrontation plan.
What it changes: Trains emotional resilience and denial breakdown.

What it is: Pinpoints where meaning has collapsed or become performative.
How to use it: Describe routines or rituals. Ask AI to identify which ones lack emotional or symbolic substance.
